title: Unlike Mex. and Nig., Iran has not democratized

content.question: Unlike Mexico and Nigeria, Iran has NOT experienced which of the following?

choices.label: A recent move toward liberal democracy
The economic benefits of finding oil
Student uprisings protesting elections and unpopular decisions

content.answer: A recent move toward liberal democracy

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
